data.title: Montessori - Full Catalog - Spring 2019
data.meta_description: Montessori - Full Catalog - Spring 2019 - Free download as PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read online for free. The first document summarizes four books for children and young adults. It provides brief descriptions of the plots and main characters for the novels Hello, Universe by Erin Entrada Kelly, The Infinite Lives of Maisie Day by Christopher Edge, The Summer of Broken Things by Margaret Peterson Haddix, and Littler Women: A Modern Retelling by Laura Schaefer. The second document summarizes two graphic novels, A Midsummer Night's Dream: Manga Classics by William Shakespeare and Crystal S. Chan and It's Trevor Noah: Born a Crime by Trevor Noah. It briefly describes the stories and characters in each adaptation.
